sentence: Pool was wonderful though FULL
Where else can you spend the morning at the theme park and quickly return to your room and go for a quick swim or take a nap before heading back to the park for the evening entertainment
Pools are lovely bring a swimsuit
The amenities your own GATE to get in and out of the California Adventure park lovely lobby and pool fabulous restaurants and EVEN five park hopper passes given upon check in are SO worth a splurge
The absolute highlight for us was the pool
The proximity to the parks make it easy to step away from the park and relax swim rest before going back3
The good news is you can go to the pool or Downtown Disney so there is plenty to doThe location is great and saves many steps if you are going to the parks
The pool area is family friendly and the lifeguards are trained in all types of rescue I asked about training
On the good side the pools were very nice especially the water slide
The pools are very nice we hope to return one day
Working on hotel and pool
The pools were being refurbished there was a shuttle to the Disneyland hotel
My family and I were disappointed when the pool was close
The construction both pool and rooms is noisy3
Day three was pool and fly back
As a result there are rooms being reconditioned and the pools are all out
Though a bit pricey the Grand Californias location is the best for those that enjoy the park but like to take a break and go to the pool
Though the pool is closed for refurbishment was able to enjoy the Disneyland hotels pools
Beautiful facility but not told that the pool was closed for renovations when booking the reservation
Sure we could have taken a shuttle to another hotel pool but that took more time and we just were n’t interested in leaving the hotel — we should not have had to
We did have a beautiful view of the pools and on the 5th floor we could see part of the parks
The children both said the pool was n’t as good as the Disneyland Resort Hotel especially the slide
Plenty of space for chairs just no chairs sorry for 80 per night I think it ’s reasonable to expect a chair at the pool
Servers are available in the pool area for food an beverages including adult beverages but there is not a bar easily accessible from within the pool
We arrived in August 17th and our room was not ready so they gave us Keys to show down at the pool which is fine
I was not as impressed with the rooms as I thought I would be for the cost of staying there but the service was good and the pool was great
I expressed my disappointment to the pool staff who mentioned we could walk across the road to their other Disney Resort and use their slides whilst Grand Californians were out of action
The pools were fine although they did not seem to all be heated and the biggest one with the slides closed at 5 pm for unknown reasons on of our days there
There is construction going on for the pool bar which affected the kids nap time and was n’t very relaxing
The pool bar is fine food is not great but it is fine as long as the live music is not on
